message:
Confirm object synset assignment.
Object assigned to synset: sink.n.01
Definition: plumbing fixture consisting of a water basin fixed to a wall or floor and having a drainpipe
Reminder: synset should match the object and not its contents.
(e.g. orange juice bottle needs to match orange_juice__bottle.n.01
and not orange_juice.n.01)

Confirm object visual appearance.
Requirements:
- make sure there is only one rigid body.
- make sure the object has a valid texture or appearance.
- make sure the object has all parts necessary.
